title: Residents of This 1BR/1BA Home Love Visiting the On-Site Sauna & Spa!
posting_body: Finest Waterside Living in Marina Del Rey
Dolphin Marina Monte Carlo Apartments is now offering this lovely one-bedroom, one-bathroom home.
This community, geared towards active seniors aged sixty-two and up, features a quaint fireplace as well as an oversized soaking tub.
Residents love the gourmet kitchen with its gas stove.
Thanks to the central heat and air conditioning, the living spaces remain comfortable year-round.
The home is wired for high-speed Internet.
Select apartments have walk-in closets and others offer private balconies with views of the marina.
The community has many amenities, such as a heated pool and sauna.
Residents can also lift weights in the gym or soothe their muscles in the spa.
Great local attractions, shops, and restaurants await potential renters.
13970 Panay Way Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
